DaD.city

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.city.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton used to handle money exchange between player and a safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Bank _instance
      Private instance of class.
      private int _minimumGoldPerStock
      Minimum of gold to put in bank, if amount if below it will refuse stocking money.
      private static java.lang.String[] _options
      All available choices.
      private int _stockedGold
      Golds in bank.
